title: [SUGGESTION] Can "Log Out" Option be added to the Client?
body:
Some of us have 2 or 3 or maybe more accounts on the same server, so it would help having the option to "Log Out" from one account, go back to Log in Screen, and just change Log in details instead of closing the client and reopening it. This option would help a lot summoners who still have HDD type hard disk drives and do have the option to upgrade to SSD yet. Sounds easy for Riot's Developers :D
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}

replies.body: Y'know, that could actually be a useful feature for a lot of our players I think. I can't make those kinds of changes myself, but if you post this over in Client Discussion as well there's a much better chance of the devs noticing it! (who *can* make these things happen)

Thank you very much! I did not really know how boards work. I re-posted it to Client Discussion. Thanks for help!
{{sticker:galio-happy}}
